mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM board ORDER BY bno desc LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum};

SELECT bno, title, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM board
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY bno desc LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum};

SELECT count(bno) FROM board
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
